mapper.sql: SELECT s.stack_id AS stackId, s.stack_name AS stackName, c.company_name AS companyName, w.workplace_name AS workplaeName, f.factory_category AS factoryCategory, f.factory_name AS factoryName, d.department_name AS departmentName FROM stack s LEFT JOIN workplace w ON s.workplace_id = w.workplace_id LEFT JOIN company c ON w.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN factory f ON s.factory_id = f.factory_id LEFT JOIN department d ON f.department_id = d.department_id
